Name: go_gc_cycles_automatic_gc_cycles_total
Description: Count of completed GC cycles generated by the Go runtime.

Name: go_gc_cycles_forced_gc_cycles_total
Description: Count of completed GC cycles forced by the application.

Name: go_gc_cycles_total_gc_cycles_total
Description: Count of all completed GC cycles.

Name: go_gc_duration_seconds
Description: A summary of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.

Name: go_gc_heap_allocs_by_size_bytes_total
Description: Distribution of heap allocations by approximate size. Note that this does not include tiny objects as defined by /gc/heap/tiny/allocs:objects, only tiny blocks.

Name: go_gc_heap_allocs_bytes_total
Description: Cumulative sum of memory allocated to the heap by the application.

Name: go_gc_heap_allocs_objects_total
Description: Cumulative count of heap allocations triggered by the application. Note that this does not include tiny objects as defined by /gc/heap/tiny/allocs:objects, only tiny blocks.

Name: go_gc_heap_frees_by_size_bytes_total
Description: Distribution of freed heap allocations by approximate size. Note that this does not include tiny objects as defined by /gc/heap/tiny/allocs:objects, only tiny blocks.

Name: go_gc_heap_frees_bytes_total
Description: Cumulative sum of heap memory freed by the garbage collector.

Name: go_gc_heap_frees_objects_total
Description: Cumulative count of heap allocations whose storage was freed by the garbage collector. Note that this does not include tiny objects as defined by /gc/heap/tiny/allocs:objects, only tiny blocks.

Name: go_gc_heap_goal_bytes
Description: Heap size target for the end of the GC cycle.

Name: go_gc_heap_objects_objects
Description: Number of objects, live or unswept, occupying heap memory.

Name: go_gc_heap_tiny_allocs_objects_total
Description: Count of small allocations that are packed together into blocks. These allocations are counted separately from other allocations because each individual allocation is not tracked by the runtime, only their block. Each block is already accounted for in allocs-by-size and frees-by-size.

Name: go_gc_pauses_seconds_total
Description: Distribution individual GC-related stop-the-world pause latencies.

Name: go_goroutines
Description: Number of goroutines that currently exist.

Name: go_info
Description: Information about the Go environment.

Name: go_memory_classes_heap_free_bytes
Description: Memory that is completely free and eligible to be returned to the underlying system, but has not been. This metric is the runtime's estimate of free address space that is backed by physical memory.

Name: go_memory_classes_heap_objects_bytes
Description: Memory occupied by live objects and dead objects that have not yet been marked free by the garbage collector.

Name: go_memory_classes_heap_released_bytes
Description: Memory that is completely free and has been returned to the underlying system. This metric is the runtime's estimate of free address space that is still mapped into the process, but is not backed by physical memory.

Name: go_memory_classes_heap_stacks_bytes
Description: Memory allocated from the heap that is reserved for stack space, whether or not it is currently in-use.

Name: go_memory_classes_heap_unused_bytes
Description: Memory that is reserved for heap objects but is not currently used to hold heap objects.

Name: go_memory_classes_metadata_mcache_free_bytes
Description: Memory that is reserved for runtime mcache structures, but not in-use.

Name: go_memory_classes_metadata_mcache_inuse_bytes
Description: Memory that is occupied by runtime mcache structures that are currently being used.

Name: go_memory_classes_metadata_mspan_free_bytes
Description: Memory that is reserved for runtime mspan structures, but not in-use.

Name: go_memory_classes_metadata_mspan_inuse_bytes
Description: Memory that is occupied by runtime mspan structures that are currently being used.

Name: go_memory_classes_metadata_other_bytes
Description: Memory that is reserved for or used to hold runtime metadata.

Name: go_memory_classes_os_stacks_bytes
Description: Stack memory allocated by the underlying operating system.

Name: go_memory_classes_other_bytes
Description: Memory used by execution trace buffers, structures for debugging the runtime, finalizer and profiler specials, and more.

Name: go_memory_classes_profiling_buckets_bytes
Description: Memory that is used by the stack trace hash map used for profiling.

Name: go_memory_classes_total_bytes
Description: All memory mapped by the Go runtime into the current process as read-write. Note that this does not include memory mapped by code called via cgo or via the syscall package. Sum of all metrics in /memory/classes.

Name: go_memstats_alloc_bytes
Description: Number of bytes allocated and still in use.

Name: go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total
Description: Total number of bytes allocated, even if freed.

Name: go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table.

Name: go_memstats_frees_total
Description: Total number of frees.

Name: go_memstats_gc_cpu_fraction
Description: The fraction of this program's available CPU time used by the GC since the program started.

Name: go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata.

Name: go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes
Description: Number of heap bytes allocated and still in use.

Name: go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes
Description: Number of heap bytes waiting to be used.

Name: go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes
Description: Number of heap bytes that are in use.

Name: go_memstats_heap_objects
Description: Number of allocated objects.

Name: go_memstats_heap_released_bytes
Description: Number of heap bytes released to OS.

Name: go_memstats_heap_sys_bytes
Description: Number of heap bytes obtained from system.

Name: go_memstats_last_gc_time_seconds
Description: Number of seconds since 1970 of last garbage collection.

Name: go_memstats_lookups_total
Description: Total number of pointer lookups.

Name: go_memstats_mallocs_total
Description: Total number of mallocs.

Name: go_memstats_mcache_inuse_bytes
Description: Number of bytes in use by mcache structures.

Name: go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes used for mcache structures obtained from system.

Name: go_memstats_mspan_inuse_bytes
Description: Number of bytes in use by mspan structures.

Name: go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes used for mspan structures obtained from system.

Name: go_memstats_next_gc_bytes
Description: Number of heap bytes when next garbage collection will take place.

Name: go_memstats_other_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes used for other system allocations.

Name: go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes
Description: Number of bytes in use by the stack allocator.

Name: go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes obtained from system for stack allocator.

Name: go_memstats_sys_bytes
Description: Number of bytes obtained from system.

Name: go_sched_goroutines_goroutines
Description: Count of live goroutines.

Name: go_sched_latencies_seconds
Description: Distribution of the time goroutines have spent in the scheduler in a runnable state before actually running.

Name: http_request_duration_seconds_sum
Description: The HTTP request latencies in seconds.

Name: http_request_duration_seconds_count
Description: The HTTP request latencies in seconds.

Name: http_request_duration_seconds_bucket
Description: The HTTP request latencies in seconds.
